addPatternsDescription-s1.message: Adds patterns to the list of user-defined filters

updateExternalSubscription_titleDescript.message: subscription title to be used if a new subscription is created. This parameter will be ignored if the subscription already exists.

addPatterns_patternsDescription-s1.message: list of filter patterns to be added

getSubscriptionAtDescription-s1.message: Retrieves a subscription by its position in the list

getSubscriptionAt_indexDescription-s1.message: subscription's position in the list, zero-based

removePatterns_patternsDescription-s1.message: list of filter patterns to be removed

s2.message:
It allows among other things getting some information from Adblock
  Plus or adding "special" subscriptions that will be updated by another extension.

s1.message:
This interface can be used from extensions that wish to integrate with Adblock
  Plus.

updateExternalSubscription_patternsDescr.message: list of filter patterns that the subscription should contain

getSubscriptionAt_returnDescription-s1.message: the requested subscription or {1} if the index provided is invalid

getSubscription_idDescription-s1.message: subscription's identifier (this is subscription's URL for regular subscriptions)

removeExternalSubscription_idDescription.message: subscription's identifier (for external subscriptions this can be any string)

getSubscription_returnDescription-s1.message: the requested subscription or {1} if no subscription with the given identifier exists

getInstalledVersionDescription-s1.message: Retrieves the version of the installed Adblock Plus extension. Note that this is the version number as reported by the extension manager or InstallTrigger and it might be incorrect if the latter is used (in Mozilla Suite or SeaMonkey).

updateExternalSubscription_idDescription.message: subscription's identifier (for external subscriptions this can be any string)

removePatternsDescription-s1.message: Removes patterns from the list of user-defined filters

updateExternalSubscriptionDescription-s3.message:
Also, before Adblock Plus 1.3 this method returned a boolean indicating whether
the subscription could be created. Creating a subscription can no longer fail in
Adblock Plus 1.3 and higher but its identifier might be rewritten — the new identifier
will be returned.

updateExternalSubscriptionDescription-s2.message:
Adblock Plus 1.3 and higher: External subscriptions will no longer be saved to disk along
with other subscription, updateExternalSubscription() method needs to be called each time
the browser starts up to restore the subscription. This is to prevent keeping a stale
external subscription in the list if the user uninstalls the extension managing it.

updateExternalSubscriptionDescription-s1.message:
Updates an external subscription (or creates it if no such subscription
currently exists). Such a subscription will not be updated by Adblock Plus, instead
the extension calling this method is responsible for updating it and removing once the
subscription is no longer required.

getSubscriptionDescription-s1.message: Retrieves a subscription by its identifier

removeExternalSubscription_returnDescrip.message: {1} if the subscription has been successfully removed, {2} if no such subscription exists or the subscription isn't managed externally

subscriptionCountDescription-s1.message: Number of subscriptions in the list (including special subscriptions)

updateExternalSubscription_returnDescrip.message: effective subscription identifier (might not be identical to the id parameter)
